Text: Körös:  It has three source rivers, all of which have their origin in the Apuseni Mountains in Transylvania, Romania: Crișul Alb (Fehér-Körös), Crișul Negru (Fekete-Körös) and Crișul Repede (Sebes-Körös).

Text: Körös:  The section downstream from Gyomaendrőd is also called the Hármas-Körös (Hungarian for "triple Körös").
